```{r warning=TRUE, include=FALSE}

library(sf)
library(ggplot2)
library(tmap)
library(tmaptools)
library(leaflet)
library(dplyr)

mydata <- read.csv(file = "FRA.csv", header = TRUE, stringsAsFactors=TRUE, fileEncoding="latin1")

#mydata <- readr::read_csv("FRA.csv")

mymap <- st_read("FranceMap/FRA_adm2.shp", stringsAsFactors = FALSE)

datamap <- inner_join(mymap, mydata)

```

```{r warning=FALSE, include=FALSE}

tm_shape(datamap) +
  tm_polygons("Décès...22.04", id = "NAME_2", palette = "Greens")+ "Décés"
  theme_minimal()
  
tmap_mode("view")
GdpMap <- tmap_last()

```
